description:
All the girls are settled in and ready to go with their week of bondage, sex & orgasms. Bags unpacked, introductions made and the ropes are uncoiled.
After Amber opens her home & friends to my ropes, I jump in head first getting myself settled in and acquainted. Nina, Kristine & Dia are bound, gagged & made to heat the snowbound home with their screams & orgasms.
title: Tahoe: Exiled from Dick Mountain pt 2 Getting Comfortable
